title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1951.3 - Appeal procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1951.3 - Appeal procedure

State Regulations

An inmate who has been determined to be unsuitable for
presumptive work release approval may appeal the decision to central office
temporary release. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1951.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
